title: Greeking Machine
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921010317/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921010317/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tools) : [Text Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921010317/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Text%20Tools): Greeking Machine**

[Greeking Machine](http://web.archive.org/web/20130921010317/http:/www.duckisland.com/GreekMachine.asp) provides culturally-inspired (and often humorous) alternatives to standard Lorem Ipsum greeking text. These include Classical Latin, Hillbilly, Marketing, Matrix, Metropolitan, Pseudo German, and Techno Babble flavors. It is substantially different from a geeking machine, which bites the heads off live chickens.
author: paul d hunt
